file_handler module¶

file_handler.save_pickle_obj(obj: object, filename: str) → None¶

Save object as a pickle. Soon to be deprecated.

Parameters

  • obj (object) – instance to be saved

  • filename (str) – Absolute path where to save including filename

Returns

None

file_handler.load_pickle_obj(filename: str) → None¶

Loads a pickle object. Soon to be deprecated.

Parameters

filename (str) – Absolute path to the file

Returns

None

file_handler.save_to_json(data: object, filename: str) → None¶

Saves data to JSON

Parameters

  • data (object) – data to be serlaized as a JSON

  • filename (str) – Absolute path where to save including filename

Returns

None

file_handler.load_from_json(filename: str) → object¶

Loads a JSON

Parameters
